subject: Economy
question_en: What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) at current market price of India in 2018?
question_hi: 2018 में भारतीय विकास (GDP) की वर्तमान मामूली के बार्बीएचडी (GDP-CB) का विस्तृति क्या थी ?
explanation_en: According to the data from Government of India, the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) at current market price of India in 2018 was Rs. 23,074 billion. (Source: https://data.gov.in/census2011/india/)

subject: Economy
question_en: How much was the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India in 2019?
question_hi: भार 2019 मैयाँर (Gross Domestic Product) भार 2019 मैयाँ (Gross Domestic Product) भार 2019 मैयाँ (Gross Domestic Product)
explanation_en: According to the data provided by National Statistical Institute, the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2019 was Rs. 289,84,718 (Rs. रिकर 289,84,718)
question_en: What was the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India in 2019?
explanation_en: The GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India in 2019 was Rs. 289,84,718.
question_en: What was the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India in 2019?
explanation_en: According to the data provided by National Statistical Institute, the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India in 2019 year was Rs. 289,84,718.
question_en: What was the GDP (Gross Domestic Product) of India in 2019?
explanation_en: The Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in 2019 was Rs. 289,84,718.
